TopicTitle: Unable to launch from runway in Realistic Progression One

Articles.Content:
I have an RP-1 install that followed Carnasa's tutorial for the installation:

(I did not include Waterfall or KER)

I attemped to create an X-plane, but it's not letting me launch from the runway.

Help me pls

What exactly happens when you try to launch from the runway? (Screenshots would be useful) 

Are you trying to launch from the Spaceplane Hangar but you don’t get to the runway? That’s meant to happen- KCT makes building craft take time and the earliest planes usually take about 30-40 days to build, check the KCT window. Or is the issue that you’ve already built the plane but KCT won’t let you launch it from the runway?

The best way to get help with RO/RP-1 is to ask on the RO/RP-1 discord, that’s where the mod developers and many experienced RP-1 players tend to gather and you're more likely to get the solution there than on the KSP forums.

14 hours ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

That’s meant to happen- KCT makes building craft take time and the earliest planes usually take about 30-40 days to build, check the KCT window. Or is the issue that you’ve already built the plane but KCT won’t let you launch it from the runway?

The best way to get help with RO/RP-1 is to ask on the RO/RP-1 discord, that’s where the mod developers and many experienced RP-1 players tend to gather and you're more likely to get the solution there than on the KSP forums.

Sorry, forgot to mention that I can't launch from the runway in a KCT simulation, I havent tested it in the actual game world, only in simulations.

As for screenshots, I don't have any, but it just launches from the launchpad instead of the runway even when I am in the Spaceplane hangar.
